name: Cave Crawler (itch)
description:
Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.

  • 5 levels
  • 5 unique enemies
  • 1 boss fight
  • 3 environmental hazards
  • Retro-inspired art, music, and sound effects
  • Average time to beat: 5-10 minutes
